name: Food & Water Europe
legal: US registered charity with a "centre d’opération" in Belgium
goal:
Food & Water Europe is the European programme of Food & Water Watch, a nonprofit organisation based in the United States.

Food & Water Europe champions healthy food and clean water for all. We stand up to corporations that put profits before people and advocate for a democracy that improves people’s lives and protects our environment.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Shale gas, fossil fuels, climate change, factory farming, GMOs, water as a human right, public water management
